[[Image:Philippa Boyens.jpg|thumb|250px|Philippa Boyens at ComicCon]]
'''Philippa Boyens''' co-wrote the screenplays for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'']] and [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' film series]] with [[Peter Jackson]] and [[Fran Walsh]]. She also co-produced ''The Hobbit'' (film series). Her son [[Calum Gittins]] played [[Haleth (film character)|Haleth]], son of [[Háma]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers|The Two Towers]]'' and her daughter Phoebe played a [[hobbits|Hobbit]].
